titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Italian, Yale University, Records
Department of Italian, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:13

did.unittitle: Department of Italian, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of films, grade sheets, budgets and accounting records, and general office files documenting students, faculty, staff and curricula of the Yale Department of Italian.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Italian, Yale University, Records (RU 762). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of films, grade sheets, budgets and accounting records, and general office files documenting students, faculty, staff and curricula of the Yale Department of Italian.
